price: 7. Marka (gaalada) lagu tuuro Naarta, waxay ka maqli cartan daran iyadoo karaysa.
arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
